ship.name: Za'lek Demon Type IV
ship.condstr: You need at least 50% reputation with House Za'lek.
ship.description: The Za'lek Demon Type IV is a departure from the standard autonomous drone-focused combat philosophy, redesigned to make heavy use of long range weapons such as Za'lek Reaper suicide drones. To achieve this goal, this Demon sports a completely reworked electronics system, with top-notch specially tailoured lock-on algorithms. However, as per the no free lunch theorem, this comes at a cost of a much weaker drone command and control system, and the extra weapon slot and missile system storage required removing more of the ship's shield emitters and already thin armour.
